CustomField.description: A check in this field indicates the contact should receive information on the APR % increase applicable to their StarTrack products. (Relates to the APR object developed by SalesForce as part of the “SalesLogix project”)
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Tick this box to notify this contact about any StarTrack pricing relating matter, excluding StarTrack Courier. For example, annual price rises and other pricing updates for StarTrack services.
Please ensure at least one contact within the organisation has this field ticked.
CustomField.label: StarTrack Pricing
